cell-methods: Error: height: area: time: mean (with all samples weighted by the number of moles of air in the sample) not found in cell methods, please register
description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of CFC113 is CCl2FCClF2.  The IUPAC name for CFC113 is 1, 1, 2-trichloro-1, 2, 2-trifluoro-ethane.
ui-label: Global Mean Mole Fraction of CFC113
